channel.title: Server stops every time i get error
channel.description:
i get error and it lagg up all time....
like this: Exception in thread "Thread-51" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 19100 at rs.client.drawTabArea(client.java:1442) at rs.client.drawGameScreen(client.java:6707) at rs.client.processDrawing(client.java:7439) at rs.RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:103) at rs.client.run(client.java:3869) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

item.title: Server stops every time i get error
item.dc:creator: @bily123 bily123
item.description:
@bily123 wrote:

It means you are trying to teleport or walk to an area not in the clients database.

Read full topic
item.source: Server stops every time i get error
